artist: Artist: Antoni Tàpies; Author: Julio Cortázar; Publisher: Maeght Éditeur, Paris
description: periodical; gray cover with appearance of charcoal-rubbing; periwinkle blue brushstroke square at C with chalky writing below; text in magenta at ULC and LRC; contains loose pages of text and abstract color images; loose volume; lender's #137

title: Derrière le Miroir, No. 234
